item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a backend-focused software engineer with strong interest in building scalable, reliable systems.

Hugo makes use of a variety of open source projects including:

What I work on

  • Designing and building REST & API-driven backends
  • AI-powered systems using LLMs and vision models
  • Agent-based workflows and orchestration
  • Performance, cost, and production constraints

Tech Stack

  • Languages: Python, Go, JavaScript
  • Backend: REST APIs, background jobs, authentication
  • Databases: PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB
  • AI/ML: LLM APIs, image & video pipelines
  • Infra: Docker, Linux, cloud deployment

I enjoy working close to real-world constraints—latency, cost, safety, and scale—and turning ideas into production-ready systems.
